title: Commure Inc | Senior Software Engineer | Hyderbad/Remote
content:
Years of Experience: 2+
Previous Company: **Visa Inc**
Current Titke : Software Engineer
Current Salary: **17.2L** (fixed) + **3L**(bonus)
Company: **Commure Inc**
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Remote
Salary: **28 LPA** (Fixed)
Stock bonus: 90K USD Vested over 5 Years ( 20% each year)
Signing/ Other Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Stock): ~**44** LPA
Benefits: Insurance + Internet Reimbursement
Conclusion: Rejected since company was still registering in India, Salary was managed by Remote.com. The company shares are private, and no official records stating the worth of shares allocated to me, Everything was managed through Remote.com

++ I felt it's a low balled offer.

title: G42 | Data Scientist | Abu Dhabi, UAE
content:
Hello Leetcode Folks. I have been offered the following :

- **Education**: Dual Degree (B.Tech. + M.Tech.) From Tier 1
- **Years of Experience**: 3 years
- **Prior Experience**: Senior DS at MNC, non-FAANG in India
- **Previous TC**: 45 LPA + Stocks  (India)
- **Date of the Offer**: October 2023
- **Company**: G42
- **Title/Level**: Data Scientist
- **Location**: Abu Dhabi, UAE
- **Salary Offer**: 
	- **Base salary**: 30,000 AED per month
	- **Other perks + benefits** :
		- Other Expense (Wifi etc.): 1000 AED per Month
		- Self Life + Health Insurance
- **Relocation**: 20000 AED
- **Stocks**: None
- **Expected Hike**: Low
- **Bonus**: Performance-based bonus up to 1 to 3 months salary
- **Total comp (Salary + benefits )**: ~ 31000 AED per month or 372000 AED per year (~ 81 lpa)
  
  
Guys, Please help me to evaluate the offer 🙏
salaryTotal: : ~ 31000 Aed Per Month Or 372000 Aed Per Year (~ 81 Lpa)
